# languageOption

**Instance Property**

The requested language option to change.

## Declaration

```swift
var languageOption: MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOption { get }
```

## Discussion

The supplied language option may be the Automatic Legible Language Option, which requests the best legible language based on the user’s preferences. See [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOption/isAutomaticLegibleLanguageOption()].

## Changing the language option

- **setting**: The extent of the language setting change.
- **MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting**: The states that determine when language option changes take effect.
